    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mato_802</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Descubre como no es tan imposible esta figura. Otras ilusiones en la unidad</string>
            <string language="en">Find out why this figure is not impossible (there are other illusions in the unit).</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Finden Sie heraus, warum diese Abbildung nicht 
unmöglich ist (es gibt andere Illusionen in der Maßeinheit).</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Découvrez pourquoi cette figure n'est pas 
impossible (il y a d'autres illusions dans l'unité).</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Encontre para fora porque esta figura não é 
impossível (há outros illusions na unidade).</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scopra perchè questa figura non è impossibile 
(ci sono altre illusioni nell'unità).</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανακαλύψτε γιατί αυτός ο αριθμός δεν είναι αδύνατος 
(υπάρχουν άλλες παραισθήσεις στη μονάδα).</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">simulación interactiva que permite girar en el espacio una aparente figura imposible de Escher</string>
            <string language="en">interactive simulation which allows the user to rotate a figure created by Escher which seems to be impossible</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">perspectiva</string>
            <string language="en">perspective</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">giro</string>
            <string language="en">rotation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">imposible</string>
            <string language="en">impossible</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">geometría</string>
            <string language="en">geometry</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">tridimensional</string>
            <string language="en">three-dimensional</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">interaktive Simulation, die dem Benutzer erlaubt, eine 
Abbildung zu drehen, erstellte durch Escher, der scheint, unmöglich 
zu sein</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la simulation interactive qui permet à l'utilisateur de 
tourner une figure a créé par Escher qui semble être impossible</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">a simulação interativa que permite que o usuário gire 
uma figura criou por Escher que parece ser impossível</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">la simulazione interattiva che permette che l'utente ruoti
una figura ha creato da Escher che sembra essere impossibile</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">διαλογική προσομοίωση που επιτρέπει στο χρήστη για να 
περιστραφεί έναν αριθμό που δημιουργείται από Escher που 
φαίνεται να είναι αδύνατο</string>
          </description>
